title: Kiss Me Deadly (1955, ) Dir: Robert Aldrich Featuring Ralph Meeker - Film Noir

sources.title: Kiss Me Deadly (1955, ) Dir: Robert Aldrich Featuring Ralph Meeker - Film Noir
sources.description: Kiss Me Deadly is an independently made 1955 American film noir, produced and directed by Robert Aldrich, and starring Ralph Meeker, Albert Dekker, Paul Stewart, Juano Hernandez, Wesley Addy, and with Maxine Cooper and Cloris Leachman in their feature film debuts.The screenplay was written by Aldrich and A.I. Bezzerides, based on Mickey Spillane's crime novel Kiss Me, Deadly. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiss_Me_Deadly Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
